description: Spec Kit configuration file - Copy this to .specify/config.json and fill in your details

createPAT: To create a Personal Access Token:
1. Go to Azure DevOps → User Settings → Personal Access Tokens
3. Give it a name: 'Spec Kit Integration'
6. Copy the token and set: export AZURE_DEVOPS_PAT='token'

branchNaming._comment: When true, branches are named {work-item-id}-{title}. When false, uses auto-increment.

features._comment: Automatically archive work item data after creating spec
